content: What is the best way to determine ABI compatibility for wasm built from wit-bindgen-generated code today? Looking at the wit-component metadata, candidates seem to be either 1) the "resolve" component's wasm magic version or 2) some combination of producer versions (maybe just wit-component?)
Really I'm looking for component model ABI compatibility in general, but wit-component metadata is the only place that sort of thing seems to be encoded today
